sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import jwt_decode from 'jwt-decode' class Profile extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', company_name: '', phone: '', errors: {} } } componentDidMount() { const token = localStorage.usertoken const decoded = jwt_decode(token) this.setState({ first_name: decoded.first_name, last_name: decoded.last_name, email: decoded.email, company_name: decoded.company_name, phone: decoded.company }) } render() { return (

PROFILE

Fist Name {this.state.first_name}
Last Name {this.state.last_name}
Company Name {this.state.company_name}
Email {this.state.email}
Phone Number {this.state.phone}
) } } export default Profile
